entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
